entities

Class Tuple

  • java.lang.Object
    • entities.Tuple
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<Tuple>

    public class Tuple
extends Object
implements Comparable<Tuple>
    A database tuple with some associated cost The attribute list of the tuple must agree with the schema of the relation it belongs to
    Author:
    Nikolaos Tziavelis

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      double cost 
      Relation relation 
      double[] values 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Tuple(double[] values_list, double tuple_cost, Relation rel)
      Constructs a tuple based on a given list of values for the attributes
      CAUTION: The object will contain a reference to the passed list of values No deep copy is made
      Tuple(List<Tuple> list_of_tuples, Relation rel)
      Constructs a new tuple by concatenating a list of other tuples The cost of the new tuple is an aggregation of the other costs

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int compareTo(Tuple other)
      A tuple is compared with another according to their associated cost
      boolean equals(Object o)
      A Tuple is equal to another when they agree on the values (but not necessarily the cost)
      String flat_format() 
      double get_cost() 
      int hashCode() 
      String toString() 
      String valuesToString() 

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

      • values

        public double[] values

      • cost

        public double cost

      • relation

        public Relation relation

    • Constructor Detail

      • Tuple

        public Tuple(double[] values_list,
             double tuple_cost,
             Relation rel)
        Constructs a tuple based on a given list of values for the attributes
        CAUTION: The object will contain a reference to the passed list of values No deep copy is made
        Parameters:
        values_list - A list of values for the attributes of the relation
        tuple_cost - The cost of the tuple
        rel - The relation the tuple belongs to

      • Tuple

        public Tuple(List<Tuple> list_of_tuples,
             Relation rel)
        Constructs a new tuple by concatenating a list of other tuples The cost of the new tuple is an aggregation of the other costs
        Parameters:
        list_of_tuples - A list of tuples that will be merged to create a new one
        rel - The relation the tuple belongs to

        public String flat_format()

        public boolean equals(Object o)
